Dear all, let me clarify the previous message. The info about police may come around 7:30 is the hearsay in the street. I do NOT  mean that the police has contacted SRO or me. They may or may not come. No one knows. But as Hall Master, it’s my duty to put my residents safety as the top priority by sharing this heresay just in case it does happens. Thus the key point of the message is to remind residents to keep themselves safe by getting early dinner and staying in rooms. Or they may consider to stay outside if they choose. I don’t mean to create panic. Sorry about that if there is any inconvenience caused. My Bad. —Dr MAã€

åŒå­¸å€‘ï¼Œè®“æˆ‘æ¾„æ¸…ã€‚å‰›æ‰è¨Šæ¯æåŠ7:30ï¼Œ çµ•éæœ‰ä»»ä½•ç¢ºèªæˆ–è¯çµ¡ï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯å¾ä¸€äº›å­¸ç”Ÿä¸­å¾—åˆ°çš„çŒœåº¦å‚³è¨€ã€‚ä½†ä½œç‚ºèˆç›£ï¼Œä¸æ€•ä¸€è¬ï¼Œåªæ€•è¬ä¸€ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å…ˆæé†’å®¿ç”Ÿå€‘ï¼Œè‹¥ç•™åœ¨èˆå ‚ï¼Œæœ€å¥½æº–å‚™é£Ÿç³§ï¼Œææ—©é£Ÿé£¯ï¼Œä¿è­·è‡ªå·±ã€‚æé†’å­¸ç”Ÿæ˜¯èˆç›£è²¬ä»»ï¼Œå¯§å¯å¤šèªªä¸€å¥ï¼Œè®“å®¿ç”Ÿæœ‰æ‰€æº–å‚™ï¼Œä¸¦éæŒ‡è­¦æ–¹ä¸ƒé»åŠä¸€å®šå‰ä¾†, æ›´ä¸æ˜¯è¦æ±‚å®¿ç”Ÿé›¢é–‹èˆå ‚ã€‚è‹¥å¼•èµ·ä»»ä½•èª¤è§£æˆ–ææ…Œï¼Œè«‹è«’ã€‚—Dr MA

Dear all, let me clarify the previous message. The info about police may come around 7:30 is the hearsay in the street. I do NOT mean that the police has contacted SRO or me. They may or may not come. No one knows. But as Hall Master, it’s my duty to put my residents safety as the top priority by sharing this heresay just in case it does happens. Thus the key point of the message is to remind residents to keep themselves safe by getting early dinner and staying in rooms. Or they may consider to stay outside if they choose. I don’t mean to create panic. Sorry about that if there is any inconvenience caused. My Bad. —Dr MA
